name: Speed Breaker (Vitaman NB)
description:
A racing game where the less health you have, the faster you go.

HOW TO PLAY:

Use WASD or arrow keys to drive. If you go near the hospital, you will slowly replenish health. If you go through the Car Wash, your health will be set to your starting health. Going into the fire will decrease your health.

Made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3
